item.text: After he came down from the mountain, large crowds followed him.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> a <st data-num="3015" class="">leper</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4334" class="">approached</st> and <st data-num="4352" class="">bowed low</st> before <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st>, “<st data-num="2962">Lord</st>, <st data-num="1437" class="">if</st><n id="3" /> you are <st data-num="2309" class="">willing</st>, you <st data-num="1410" class="">can</st> <st data-num="2511" class="">make</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="2511" class="">clean</st>.”

He <st data-num="1614">stretched out</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="5495" class="">hand</st> and <st data-num="680" class="">touched</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st>, “I am <st data-num="2309" class="">willing</st>. Be <st data-num="2511" class="">clean</st>!” <st data-num="2112" class="">Immediately</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3014" class="">leprosy</st> was <st data-num="2511" class="">cleansed</st>.
Then Jesus said to him, “See that you do not speak to anyone, but go, show yourself to the priest, and bring the offering that Moses commanded, as a testimony to them.”
When he entered Capernaum, a centurion came to him asking for help:

“<st data-num="2962">Lord</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1473">my</st> <st data-num="3816" class="">servant</st><n id="2" /> is <st data-num="906">lying</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">at</st> <st data-num="3614" class="">home</st> <st data-num="3885" class="">paralyzed</st>, in <st data-num="1171" class="">terrible</st> <st data-num="928" class="">anguish</st>.”

Jesus<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="1473">I</st> will <st data-num="2064" class="">come</st> and <st data-num="2323" class="">heal</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.”

<st data-num="2532" class="">But</st> <st data-num="3588">the</st> <st data-num="1543" class="">centurion</st> <st data-num="5346" class="">replied</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st>, I <st data-num="1510" class="">am</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2425" class="">worthy</st> <st data-num="2443">to</st> have you <st data-num="1525" class="">come</st> <st data-num="5259" class="">under</st> <st data-num="1473">my</st> <st data-num="4721" class="">roof</st>! <st data-num="235" class="">Instead</st>, <st data-num="3440" class="">just</st> <st data-num="2036" class="">say</st> the <st data-num="3056" class="">word</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1473">my</st> <st data-num="3816" class="">servant</st> will be <st data-num="2390" class="">healed</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">too</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">am</st> a <st data-num="444" class="">man</st> <st data-num="5259" class="">under</st> <st data-num="1849" class="">authority</st>, with <st data-num="4757" class="">soldiers</st> <st data-num="5259" class="">under</st> <st data-num="1683" class="">me</st>.<n id="1" /> I <st data-num="3004" class="">say</st> to <st data-num="3778" class="">this one</st>, ‘<st data-num="4198" class="">Go</st>!’ <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> he <st data-num="4198" class="">goes</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> to <st data-num="243" class="">another</st> ‘<st data-num="2064" class="">Come</st>!’ <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> he <st data-num="2064" class="">comes</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> to <st data-num="1473">my</st> <st data-num="1401" class="">slave</st><n id="3" /> ‘<st data-num="4160" class="">Do</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this!’</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> he <st data-num="4160" class="">does</st> it.”<n id="4" />

When<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> this he was <st data-num="2296" class="">amazed</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="3588">those who</st> <st data-num="190" class="">followed</st> him, “I <st data-num="3004" class="">tell</st> <st data-num="4771">you</st> the <st data-num="281" class="">truth</st>,<n id="2" /> I have not <st data-num="2147" class="">found</st> <st data-num="5118" class="">such</st> <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st> in <st data-num="3762" class="">anyone</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="2474" class="">Israel</st>!

I <st data-num="3004" class="">tell</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="4183" class="">many</st> will <st data-num="2240" class="">come</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="395" class="">east</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1424" class="">west</st> to <st data-num="347">share the banquet</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="11" class="">Abraham</st>, <st data-num="2464" class="">Isaac</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2384" class="">Jacob</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="932" class="">kingdom</st> of <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven</st>,

<st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="5207" class="">sons</st> of <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="932" class="">kingdom</st> will be <st data-num="1544">thrown out</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="1857" class="">outer</st> <st data-num="4655" class="">darkness</st>,<n id="1" /> where <st data-num="1563" class="">there</st> will <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="2805" class="">weeping</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1030" class="">gnashing</st> of <st data-num="3599" class="">teeth</st>.”<n id="2" />
Then Jesus said to the centurion, “Go; just as you believed, it will be done for you.” And the servant was healed at that hour.
Now when Jesus entered Peter’s house, he saw his mother-in-law lying down, sick with a fever.

He <st data-num="680" class="">touched</st> <st data-num="846" class="">her</st> <st data-num="5495" class="">hand</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3588">the</st> <st data-num="4446" class="">fever</st> <st data-num="863" class="">left</st> <st data-num="846" class="">her</st>. <st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> she <st data-num="1453" class="">got up</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> began to <st data-num="1247" class="">serve</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>.<n id="2" />

When it <st data-num="1096" class="">was</st> <st data-num="3798" class="">evening</st>, <st data-num="4183" class="">many</st> <st data-num="1139" class="">demon-possessed</st> people were <st data-num="4374" class="">brought</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>. He <st data-num="1544">drove out</st> <st data-num="3588">the</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">spirits</st> with a <st data-num="3056" class="">word</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2323" class="">healed</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="3588">who</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">were</st> <st data-num="2560" class="">sick</st>.<n id="2" />

In this way what was spoken by the prophet Isaiah was fulfilled:

“He took our weaknesses and carried our diseases.”
Now when Jesus saw a large crowd around him, he gave orders to go to the other side of the lake.

<st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> an <st data-num="1122">expert in the law</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="4334" class="">came</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> and <st data-num="3004">said</st>, “<st data-num="1320">Teacher</st>, I will <st data-num="190" class="">follow</st> <st data-num="4771">you</st> <st data-num="3699" class="">wherever</st> you <st data-num="565" class="">go</st>.”<n id="3" />

<st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="258">Foxes</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="5454" class="">dens</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3588">the</st> <st data-num="4071" class="">birds</st> in <st data-num="3588">the</st> <st data-num="3772" class="">sky</st><n id="1" /> have <st data-num="2682" class="">nests</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> <st data-num="3588">the</st> <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st> of <st data-num="444" class="">Man</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">has</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">no</st> <st data-num="4226" class="">place</st> to <st data-num="2827" class="">lay</st> his <st data-num="2776" class="">head</st>.”<n id="2" />

<st data-num="2087" class="">Another</st><n id="1" /> of <st data-num="3588">the</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3101" class="">disciples</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="2962">Lord</st>, <st data-num="2010" class="">let</st> <st data-num="1473">me</st> <st data-num="4413">first</st> <st data-num="565" class="">go</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2290" class="">bury</st> <st data-num="1473">my</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">father</st>.”
But Jesus said to him, “Follow me, and let the dead bury their own dead.”
As he got into the boat, his disciples followed him.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> a <st data-num="3173" class="">great</st> <st data-num="4578" class="">storm</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">developed</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">on</st> <st data-num="3588">the</st> <st data-num="2281" class="">sea</st> <st data-num="1520">so that</st> <st data-num="3588">the</st> <st data-num="2949" class="">waves</st> began to <st data-num="2572" class="">swamp</st> <st data-num="3588">the</st> <st data-num="4143" class="">boat</st>.<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="846" class="">he</st> was <st data-num="2518" class="">asleep</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">So</st> they <st data-num="4334" class="">came</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="1453" class="">woke</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="1453">up</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st>, “<st data-num="2962">Lord</st>, <st data-num="4982" class="">save</st> us! We are about to <st data-num="622" class="">die</st>!”

<st data-num="2532" class="">But</st><n id="1" /> he <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “<st data-num="5101" class="">Why</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> you <st data-num="1169" class="">cowardly</st>, you <st data-num="3640">people of little faith</st>?” <st data-num="5119" class="">Then</st> he <st data-num="1453" class="">got up</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2008" class="">rebuked</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3588">the</st> <st data-num="417" class="">winds</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3588">the</st> <st data-num="2281" class="">sea</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> it <st data-num="1096" class="">was</st> <st data-num="3173" class="">dead</st> <st data-num="1055" class="">calm</st>.
And the men were amazed and said, “What sort of person is this? Even the winds and the sea obey him!”
When he came to the other side, to the region of the Gadarenes, two demon-possessed men coming from the tombs met him. They were extremely violent, so that no one was able to pass by that way.

They<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2896">cried out</st>, “<st data-num="5207">Son</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>, leave <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> alone!<n id="2" /> Have you <st data-num="2064" class="">come</st> <st data-num="5602" class="">here</st> to <st data-num="928" class="">torment</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="4253" class="">before</st> the <st data-num="2540" class="">time</st>?”<n id="3" />

A<n id="1" /> <st data-num="4183" class="">large</st> <st data-num="34" class="">herd</st> of <st data-num="5519" class="">pigs</st><n id="2" /> was <st data-num="1006" class="">feeding</st> some <st data-num="3112" class="">distance</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">Then</st> <st data-num="3588">the</st> <st data-num="1142" class="">demons</st> <st data-num="3870" class="">begged</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="1487">If</st> you <st data-num="1544" class="">drive</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="1544">out</st>, <st data-num="649" class="">send</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> <st data-num="3588">the</st> <st data-num="34" class="">herd</st> of <st data-num="5519" class="">pigs</st>.”<n id="2" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> he <st data-num="3004">said</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="5207">Go</st>!” <st data-num="1161" class="">So</st><n id="2" /> they <st data-num="1831">came out</st> and <st data-num="565" class="">went</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="5519" class="">pigs</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="34" class="">herd</st> <st data-num="3729">rushed</st> <st data-num="2598">down</st> <st data-num="3588">the</st> <st data-num="2911">steep slope</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="2281" class="">lake</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="599" class="">drowned</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="5204" class="">water</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="3588" class="">The</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1006" class="">herdsmen</st> <st data-num="5343">ran off</st>, <st data-num="565" class="">went</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="4172" class="">town</st>,<n id="2" /> and <st data-num="518" class="">told</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">everything</st> that had happened to <st data-num="3588">the</st> <st data-num="1139">demon-possessed men</st>.
Then the entire town came out to meet Jesus. And when they saw him, they begged him to leave their region.
